title: xSkylarx
author: xSkylarx
content: Hi guys. I hope someone could help me with this.I have Ronin and Metamask wallet that is connected to my Trezor T. Recently, this kind of warning appear everytime I make transactions using the hardware wallet. I already reached out to metamask support to see if they have a solution but they just give me a ticket no. and said they will contact me soon. I already tried using different browser and update them to latest version but the warning is still there. I'm afraid I won't be able to access my stored assets once connect v8 is fully phased out. Is there any way I can do to manually update to connect v9?

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: xSkylarx on November 29, 2023, 04:45:06 AMI already tried using different browser and update them to latest version but the warning is still there.Apparently, there is a way to make it work, but it requires tweaking the settings on Firefox: Infinite spinner on Connect for Firefox users with Total Cookie Protection- Credit goes to "simonmales from Reddit".

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: @op please follow up and let us know if you get it fixed via SFR10's info or other info.
